mapper.select: select a.id, a.deptid as "dept.id", b.name as "dept.name", a.teacherid as "user.userId", c.realName as "user.realName", a.islead, a.courseid as "course.id", d.name as "course.name" from classteacher a left join dept b on a.deptid = b.id left join user c on a.teacherid = c.userid left join course d on a.courseid = d.id where a.teacherid = #{user.userId} and islead = 1
